name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Donald BROWN, Appellee

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Donald BROWN, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of MAY, 1994, the appeal is quashed. This matter is transferred to Superior Court.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ronald Eisenberg, Office of the Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for the Com.
John Packel, Office of the Public Defender, Philadelphia, for D. Brown.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 280
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Donald BROWN, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 19, 1994.
Ronald Eisenberg, Office of the Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for the Com.
John Packel, Office of the Public Defender, Philadelphia, for D. Brown.
